code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useAuth}from'../context/AuthContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Unauthorized=()=>{const{user}=useAuth();const getDashboardLink=()=>{if(!user)return'/login';switch(user.role){case'admin':return'/admin/dashboard';case'alumni':return'/alumni/dashboard';case'student':return'/student/dashboard';default:return'/login';}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"error-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"403"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Access Denied"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"You don't have permission to access this page."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:getDashboardLink(),className:"btn btn-primary",children:"Go to Dashboard"})]})});};export default Unauthorized;
